mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_car(user_id, shop_id, shop_name,commodity_id, commodity_name, info_id,quantity,url) VALUES (#{vo.userId},#{vo.shopId},#{vo.shopName},#{vo.commodityId}, #{vo.commodityName},#{vo.infoId},#{vo.quantity},#{vo.url})
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_car SET quantity = quantity + #{num} WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shop_car WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT sc.id, sc.shop_id, sc.shop_name, sc.commodity_id, sc.commodity_name, sc.quantity, sc.create_time, sc.url, ci.specification, ci.weight, ci.price FROM shop_car sc LEFT JOIN commodity_info ci on sc.info_id = ci.id WHERE sc.user_id = #{id} ORDER BY sc.create_time ASC
